translations.import_hint: Paste the configuration you want to import into the field below, then click the import button:

translations.start_import_tooltip: Click to import the data you pasted above
translations.import_error_no_format_version: The imported data does not contain a format version
translations.import_error_no_data: The imported object does not contain any data
translations.import_error_wrong_format_version: The imported data is in an unsupported format version (expected %1 or lower but got %2)

The page will be automatically reloaded.

translations.copy_hidden_tooltip: Click to copy the hidden value - this is sensitive data ‚ö†Ô∏è

translations.new_entry_tooltip: Click to create a new entry
translations.remove_from_queue: Remove this song from the queue
translations.delete_from_list: Delete this song from the list
translations.couldnt_remove_from_queue: Couldn't remove this song from the queue
translations.couldnt_delete_from_list: Couldn't delete this song from the list
translations.clear_list_confirm: Do you really want to clear the list and leave only the currently playing song?
translations.scroll_to_playing: Scroll to the currently playing song
translations.scroll_to_bottom: Click to scroll to the bottom
translations.volume_shared_tooltip: Volume level is shared between tabs - disable in the configuration menu
translations.middle_click_open_tab: Middle-click to open in a new tab
translations.open_current_lyrics: Open the current song's lyrics in a new tab
translations.open_lyrics: Open this song's lyrics in a new tab
translations.open_lyrics_search_prompt: Enter the song title and artist to search for the lyrics:
translations.lyrics_rate_limited-1:
You are being rate limited.
Please wait a few seconds before requesting more lyrics.
translations.lyrics_rate_limited-n:
You are being rate limited.
Please wait %1 seconds before requesting more lyrics.
translations.lyrics_not_found_confirm_open_search:
Couldn't find a lyrics page for this song.
Do you want to open genius.com to manually search for it?
translations.lyrics_not_found_click_open_search: Couldn't find lyrics URL - click to open the manual lyrics search
translations.lyrics_clear_cache_confirm_prompt-1:
The lyrics cache currently has %1 entry.
Do you really want to delete them?
translations.lyrics_clear_cache_confirm_prompt-n:
The lyrics cache currently has %1 entries.
Do you really want to delete them?
translations.lyrics_cache_changed_clear_confirm:
You have changed settings that affect the data in the lyrics cache, which breaks lyrics URL lookups.
Do you want to clear the cache now?
translations.hotkey_input_click_to_change_tooltip: %1 - Currently set to: %2 - Enter any key combination to change. Note: some screen readers might block certain key combinations.
translations.hotkey_input_click_to_reset_tooltip: Reset to the last saved key combination
translations.open_config_menu_tooltip: Click to open the configuration menu
translations.feature_help_button_tooltip: Click to get more information about the following feature: "%1"
translations.welcome_text_line_2: I hope you enjoy using %1 as much as I enjoyed making it üòÉ
translations.welcome_text_line_3: If you like %1, please leave a rating on %2GreasyFork%3 or %4OpenUserJS%5
translations.welcome_text_line_4: My work relies on donations so please consider %1donating ‚ù§Ô∏è%2
translations.welcome_text_line_5: Found a bug or want to suggest a feature? Please %1open an issue on GitHub%2
translations.new_version_available:
A new version of %1 is available!
You currently have version %2 installed and you can update to version %3
translations.reenable_in_config_menu: (can be re-enabled in the configuration menu)
translations.expand_release_notes: Click to expand the latest release notes
translations.collapse_release_notes: Click to collapse the latest release notes
translations.thumbnail_overlay_toggle_btn_tooltip_hid: Disable the thumbnail overlay - middle-click or shift-click to open in a new tab
translations.thumbnail_overlay_toggle_btn_tooltip_sho: Enable the thumbnail overlay - middle-click or shift-click to open in a new tab
translations.thumbnail_overlay_indicator_tooltip: The thumbnail overlay is currently active
translations.auto_like_channels_dialog_desc:
Here you can see what channels you have set to auto-like and you can edit, enable, disable and remove them.
You can also manually create entries, though it's easier to just visit the channel page and click the button there.
translations.auto_like_button_tooltip_enabled: Click to disable auto-liking. Shift-click to open the management dialog.
translations.auto_like_button_tooltip_disabled: Click to enable auto-liking. Shift-click to open the management dialog.
translations.add_auto_like_channel_id_prompt:
Enter the user ID (@Name / UC...) or full URL of the channel you want to auto-like.
Press "cancel" to exit.
translations.add_auto_like_channel_invalid_id:
The entered user ID is invalid.
Please make sure you copy the entire channel URL! It should contain a part like "channel/UC..." or "/@..."
translations.add_auto_like_channel_already_exists_pro:
A channel with that ID is already in the list.
Do you want to change the name?
translations.add_auto_like_channel_name_prompt:
Enter the name of the channel.
Press "cancel" to exit.
translations.auto_like_channel_edit_name_prompt:
Enter the new name for this channel.
Press "cancel" to exit.
translations.auto_like_channel_edit_id_prompt:
Enter the new user ID (@Name / UC...) or full URL for this channel.
Press "cancel" to exit.
translations.auto_like_export_or_import_tooltip: Export or import your auto-liked channels
translations.auto_like_export_desc: Copy the following text to export your auto-liked channels.
translations.auto_like_import_desc: Paste the auto-liked channels you want to import into the field below, then click the import button:
translations.plugin_validation_error_invalid_property: Property '%1' with value '%2' is invalid. Example value: %3
Property '%1' with value '%2' is invalid. Example values: %3
translations.feature_desc_watermarkEnabled: Show a watermark under the site logo that opens this config menu
translations.feature_helptext_watermarkEnabled:
If this is disabled, you can still open the config menu by clicking the option in the menu that opens when you click your profile picture in the top right corner.
However it will be harder to find the easter egg ;)
translations.feature_desc_removeShareTrackingParam: Remove the tracking parameter "?si" from the URL in share menus
translations.feature_helptext_removeShareTrackingPara: For analytics purposes YouTube adds a tracking parameter to the end of the URL you can copy in the share menu. While not directly harmful, it makes the URL longer and gives YouTube more information about you and the people you send the link to.
translations.feature_desc_removeShareTrackingParamSit: On which sites should the share tracking parameter be removed?
translations.feature_desc_numKeysSkipToTime: Enable skipping to a specific time in the video by pressing a number key (0-9)
translations.feature_desc_fixSpacing: Fix spacing issues in the layout
translations.feature_helptext_fixSpacing: There are various locations in the user interface where the spacing between elements is inconsistent. This feature fixes those issues.
translations.feature_desc_thumbnailOverlayBehavior: When to automatically replace the video element with its thumbnail in the highest resolution
translations.feature_helptext_thumbnailOverlayBehavio:
The thumbnail will be shown over top of the currently playing video or song as an overlay.
This means you will not save any bandwidth as the video will still be loaded and played in the background!
translations.feature_desc_thumbnailOverlayToggleBtnSh: Add a button to the media controls to manually toggle the thumbnail
translations.feature_helptext_thumbnailOverlayToggleB:
This button will allow you to manually toggle the thumbnail on and off. This is not affected if the thumbnail replacement option is set to "never".
Once a new video or song starts playing, the default state will be restored.
Hold shift while clicking or press the middle mouse button to open the thumbnail of the highest quality in a new tab.
translations.feature_desc_thumbnailOverlayShowIndicat: Show an indicator in the bottom right corner of the thumbnail while it's active?
translations.feature_desc_thumbnailOverlayIndicatorOp: Opacity of the indicator in the bottom right corner
translations.feature_desc_thumbnailOverlayImageFit: How to fit the thumbnail image over the video element
translations.feature_desc_hideCursorOnIdle: Hide the cursor after a few seconds of inactivity over the video
translations.feature_desc_hideCursorOnIdleDelay: How many seconds of inactivity before the cursor should be hidden?
translations.feature_desc_fixHdrIssues: Prevent some rendering issues when using an HDR-compatible GPU and monitor
translations.feature_desc_showVotes: Show the amount of likes and dislikes on the currently playing song
translations.feature_helptext_showVotes: This feature is powered by Return YouTube Dislike and will show the approximate amount of likes and dislikes on the currently playing song.
translations.feature_desc_showVotesFormat: How should the likes and dislikes be formatted?
translations.feature_desc_volumeSliderLabel: Add a percentage label next to the volume slider
translations.feature_desc_volumeSliderSize: The width of the volume slider in pixels
translations.feature_desc_volumeSliderStep: Volume slider sensitivity (by how little percent the volume can be changed at a time)
translations.feature_desc_volumeSliderScrollStep: Volume slider scroll wheel sensitivity in percent - snaps to the nearest sensitivity value from above
translations.feature_helptext_volumeSliderScrollStep:
By how much percent the volume should be changed when scrolling the volume slider with the mouse wheel.
This should be a multiple of the volume slider sensitivity, otherwise there will be small irregular jumps in the volume when scrolling.
translations.feature_desc_volumeSharedBetweenTabs: Should the set volume be shared between tabs and remembered between sessions?
translations.feature_helptext_volumeSharedBetweenTabs:
If you change the volume in one tab, the volume level will be set to the same value in all other tabs that have this feature enabled.
This value will be remembered and restored across sessions, until disabled.
translations.feature_desc_setInitialTabVolume: Sets the volume level to a specific value once when opening the site
translations.feature_warning_setInitialTabVolume_volu: This feature is incompatible with the "Volume level shared between tabs" feature and will be ignored while using the shared volume feature!
translations.feature_desc_initialTabVolumeLevel: The value to set the volume level to when opening the site
translations.feature_desc_lyricsQueueButton: Add a button to each song in a list to open its lyrics page
translations.feature_desc_deleteFromQueueButton: Add a button to each song in a list to quickly remove it
translations.feature_desc_listButtonsPlacement: Where should the list buttons show up?
translations.feature_helptext_listButtonsPlacement:
There are various song lists on the site like album pages, playlists and the currently playing queue.
With this option you can choose where the list buttons should show up.
translations.feature_desc_scrollToActiveSongBtn: Add a button above the queue to scroll to the currently playing song
translations.feature_desc_clearQueueBtn: Add a button above the currently playing queue or playlist to quickly clear it
translations.feature_desc_disableBeforeUnloadPopup: Prevent the confirmation popup that appears when trying to leave the site while a song is playing
translations.feature_helptext_disableBeforeUnloadPopu:
When trying to leave the site while a few seconds into a song that is actively playing, a popup will appear asking you to confirm that you want to leave the site. It might say something along the lines of "you have unsaved data" or "this site is asking if you want to close it".
This feature disables that popup entirely.
translations.feature_desc_closeToastsTimeout: After how many seconds to close permanent notifications - 0 to only close them manually (default behavior)
translations.feature_helptext_closeToastsTimeout:
Most popups that appear in the bottom left corner will close automatically after 3 seconds with the exception of certain ones like when liking a song.
This feature allows you to set a time for those permanent popups to be closed.
The other kind of popups will stay unaffected.
Set this to 0 for the default behavior of not closing permanent notifications.
translations.feature_desc_rememberSongTime: Remember the last song's time when reloading or restoring the tab
translations.feature_helptext_rememberSongTime-1:
Sometimes when reloading the page or restoring it after accidentally closing it, you want to resume listening at the same point. This feature allows you to do that.
In order to record the song's time, you need to play it for %1 second, then its time will be remembered and be restorable for a short while.
translations.feature_helptext_rememberSongTime-n:
Sometimes when reloading the page or restoring it after accidentally closing it, you want to resume listening at the same point. This feature allows you to do that.
In order to record the song's time, you need to play it for %1 seconds, then its time will be remembered and be restorable for a short while.
translations.feature_desc_rememberSongTimeSites: On which sites should the song time be remembered and restored?
translations.feature_desc_rememberSongTimeDuration: How long in seconds to remember the song's time for after it was last played
translations.feature_desc_rememberSongTimeReduction: How many seconds to subtract when restoring the time of a remembered song
translations.feature_helptext_rememberSongTimeReducti: When restoring the time of a song that was remembered, this amount of seconds will be subtracted from the remembered time so you have more context when listening to the part that was interrupted again.
translations.feature_desc_rememberSongTimeMinPlayTime: Minimum amount of seconds a song needs to be played for its time to be remembered
translations.feature_desc_arrowKeySupport: Use arrow keys to skip forwards and backwards in the currently playing song
translations.feature_helptext_arrowKeySupport:
Normally you can only skip forwards and backwards by a fixed 10 second interval with the keys "H" and "L". This feature allows you to use the arrow keys too.
To change the amount of seconds to skip, use the option below.
translations.feature_desc_arrowKeySkipBy: By how many seconds to skip when using the arrow keys
translations.feature_desc_switchBetweenSites: Add a hotkey to switch between the YT and YTM sites on a video / song
translations.feature_helptext_switchBetweenSites: Pressing this hotkey will switch to the other site if you are on YouTube or YouTube Music while staying on the same video / song.
translations.feature_desc_switchSitesHotkey: Which hotkey needs to be pressed to switch sites?
translations.feature_desc_anchorImprovements: Add and improve links all over the page so things can be opened in a new tab easier
translations.feature_helptext_anchorImprovements: Some elements on the page are only clickable with the left mouse button, which means you can't open them in a new tab by middle-clicking or through the context menu using shift + right-click. This feature adds links to a lot of them or enlarges existing ones to make clicking easier.
translations.feature_desc_autoLikeChannels: Automatically like all songs and videos of certain channels
translations.feature_helpText_autoLikeChannels:
Once enabled, you can enable this feature for certain channels by opening their page and clicking the toggle button. Afterwards, any song you play of that channel will be liked automatically.
Use the option below to open a dialog to manage the channels.
translations.feature_desc_autoLikeChannelToggleBtn: Add a button to each channel page to enable or disable auto-liking
translations.feature_desc_autoLikePlayerBarToggleBtn: Add a button to the media controls to enable or disable auto-liking
translations.feature_desc_autoLikeTimeout: How many seconds a song needs to play before being auto-liked
translations.feature_desc_autoLikeShowToast: Show a toast notification when a song is auto-liked
translations.feature_desc_autoLikeOpenMgmtDialog: Open the dialog to manage auto-liked channels
translations.feature_desc_geniusLyrics: Add a button to the media controls of the currently playing song to open its lyrics on genius.com
translations.feature_desc_geniUrlBase: Base URL of your geniURL instance, see https://github.com/Sv443/geniURL
translations.feature_helptext_geniUrlBase:
If you have your own instance of geniURL running (for example to bypass rate limiting), you can enter its base URL here to use it for the genius.com lyrics button.
If you don't know what this is, you can leave this option as is.
translations.feature_desc_geniUrlToken: Auth token for your geniURL instance
translations.feature_helptext_geniUrlToken: To bypass rate limiting, you can provide an auth token that is also defined in the .env file of your geniURL instance.
translations.feature_desc_lyricsCacheMaxSize: Maximum amount of lyrics to keep in the cache
translations.feature_helptext_lyricsCacheMaxSize:
The lyrics of songs you listen to are stored in a cache to reduce the amount of requests to the lyrics provider.
This feature allows you to set the maximum amount of lyrics to keep in the cache.
When the limit is reached, the oldest entry will be removed to make space for any new ones.
translations.feature_desc_lyricsCacheTTL: Max amount of days to keep a lyrics entry in the cache
translations.feature_helptext_lyricsCacheTTL:
The cache that lyrics are stored in will automatically delete them after this amount of time to ensure that updates to the source are being fetched sooner or later.
If you wanna make sure that you always have the most recent lyrics, set this to a low value like 4 days.
translations.feature_helptext_clearLyricsCache: If the lyrics that are in the local cache are outdated or you just want to free up some space, you can clear the cache manually by pressing this button.
translations.feature_desc_advancedLyricsFilter: Experimental: Enable advanced filtering for the lyrics search
translations.feature_helptext_advancedLyricsFilter:
Advanced filtering includes multiple layers of filters that aim to make the lyrics lookups more reliable.
These filters may not work well for songs in your language, and songs and artists with less unique titles in general.
Warning: This feature is still experimental and might not actually perform any better than the default lyrics lookup. Make sure to confirm the prompt that appears if you changed this setting.
translations.feature_desc_disableDarkReaderSites: On which sites should the Dark Reader extension be disabled to fix layout issues?
translations.feature_helptext_disableDarkReaderSites:
The Dark Reader extension can cause issues with the layout of the site.
This feature allows you to disable Dark Reader on certain or all sites to prevent those issues.

If the extension is not installed, this feature will have no effect and can be left activated.
translations.feature_desc_sponsorBlockIntegration: Make some fixes to the layout in case SponsorBlock is installed
translations.feature_helptext_sponsorBlockIntegration:
If you have the SponsorBlock extension installed, this feature will make some fixes to the layout of the site to prevent issues that might occur.

This feature will have no effect if the extension is not installed and can be left activated in that case.
translations.feature_desc_themeSongIntegration: Fix some styling issues if the ThemeSong extension is installed
translations.feature_helptext_themeSongIntegration:
If the ThemeSong extension is installed but this feature is turned off (or vice versa), you might notice broken styling on the site.

Please always make sure this feature reflects whether the extension is installed or not!
translations.feature_desc_localeFallback: Use English as a fallback for missing translations (disable if you are contributing translations)
translations.feature_helptext_versionCheck:
This feature checks for updates every 24 hours, notifies you if a new version is available and allows you to update the script manually.
If your userscript manager extension updates scripts automatically, you can disable this feature.
translations.feature_desc_checkVersionNow: Manually check for a new version
translations.feature_desc_logLevel: How much information to log to the console
translations.feature_helptext_logLevel:
Changing this is really only needed for debugging purposes as a result of experiencing a problem.
Should you have one, you can increase the log level here, open your browser's JavaScript console (usually with Ctrl + Shift + K) and attach screenshots of that log in a GitHub issue.
translations.feature_desc_initTimeout: How many seconds to wait for features to initialize before considering them to likely be in an errored state
translations.feature_helptext_initTimeout:
This is the amount of time in milliseconds that the script will wait for features to initialize before considering them to likely be in an errored state.
This will not affect the script's behavior in a significant way, but if one of your plugins can't initialize in time, you should try increasing this value.
translations.feature_desc_toastDuration: For how many seconds custom toast notifications should be shown - 0 to disable them entirely
translations.feature_desc_showToastOnGenericError: Show a notification when an error occurs?
translations.feature_helptext_showToastOnGenericError:
Should an error occur in the script that prevents parts of it from working correctly, a notification will be shown to inform you about it.
If you encounter a problem often, please copy the error from the JavaScript console (usually in the F12 menu) and please open an issue on GitHub.
translations.feature_desc_resetConfig: Reset all settings to their default values
translations.feature_helptext_advancedMode:
After enabling this, the menu will reload and show advanced settings that are hidden by default.
This is useful if you want to more deeply customize the script's behavior and don't care about an overcrowded menu.
